thread.title: Blac Chyna displays post-baby body in a tight red catsuit | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Blac Chyna displays post-baby body in a tight red catsuit | Daily Mail Online

author: Ryan Smith For Mailonline
title: Blac Chyna displays post-baby body in a tight red catsuit | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 165 shares Blac Chyna, real name Angela White, stood tall in a pair of black booties, while a short black wig complete with bangs rounded out her scintillating look. Not to be outdone, her pal Amber, 33, showed off her equally mesmerising body in a tight black tank top, which she teamed with matching ripped skinny jeans. Hot mama: The mother-of-two displayed her jaw-dropping weight loss in a skintight red catsuit just three months after the birth of her daughter Dream Night out on the town: Once seated at the show, the dancer pals enjoyed drinks with India Love Pearly whites: The trio flashed their flawless smiles as they laughed and chatted the night away Social media star: Naturally, 28-year-old Blac Chyna posed for a series of selfies at the bash Snappy: Blac Chyna, real name Angela White, uploaded the results of her efforts on Snapchat Shady lady: Despite the evening event being held indoors, Amber donned a pair of sunglasses Giving full view of her tattoo-covered arms, the mother-of-one arrived wearing a pair of fashionable oversized tinted sunglasses, while bubblegum pink lipstick added a pop of colour to her look. Earlier in the day, Blac Chyna stripped off and slipped between the sheets for a photo shoot posted on her Instagram page, after revealing her weight has dropped from 192lbs to 152.4lbs. The reality star shared the weight update on her Snapchat on Tuesday after hopping on the scales. Mogul: Will.i.am posed for a shot with mogul and Def Jam co-founder Russell Simmons Capturing the action: The impresario whipped out out his phone to capture the night's events VIP: Snoop Dogg was also spotted at the event, arriving with his recent signee October London Puff, puff, pass: The prolific smoker was seen puffing away as he relaxed in his prime seat A bright October: Singer-songwriter October looked dapper in a white patterned tux jacket The 5' 2" beauty also shared that she's not done in her quest to perfect her physqie, as she is hoping to lose 20 more pounds by Summer 2017. Her weight loss reveal comes amid reports of a split from fiancé Rob Kardashian, who is also the father of her recently-arrived bundle of joy. News of the separation was reported by Us Weekly on Thursday, citing multiple sources, one of whom said: 'Rob thinks it's the right decision. Strike a pose: Veteran rapper LL Cool J posed with model-turned-actress Eva Marcille Glam: The erstwhile America's Next Top Model winner looked glam in a black taffeta gown My Adidas: Actor Mark Curry showed off his branded shoes and glittering belt on the carpet Style file: Celebrity stylist E.J. King rocked an eye-catching hairstyle as he arrived at the event Stepping out: Actresses Antoinette Robertson, left, Bresha Webb, right, arrived in fine style Sparkle: Actress Nafessa Williams sparkled in her glittering stylish ensemble of choice Lingerie: Basketball Wives LA star Laura Govan turned heads in a white lingerie-style top 'Chyna has disappeared for days at a time without communicating or providing any updates. This won't end well.' Another source claimed that the two had been not getting along since their first split in early December. '[It's the same] with her yelling and screaming about how his family doesn’t like or support her, and his insecurities,' the source said. At the time Rob famously released a heartbreaking video clip on Snapchat showing his empty home and Dream's bare nursery. Celebrating her body: Earlier in the day, Blac Chyna celebrated her 40lb weight loss with a racy photo shoot that she shared with her Instagram fans Confident: The newly single star put her slimmed down body on show in the scintillating shots Working fast: She has dropped 40lbs since the November arrival of her daughter Dream Weight loss goals: The 28-year-old revealed she has lost 40lbs and is down to 152.4 with her Snapchat fans on Tuesday They got back together just a few days before Christmas leading some to speculate that the split was a promo stunt for Keeping Up With The Kardashians and their own reality show, Rob & Chyna. However, the two have been living separately as Chyna moved back into her home and Rob lives in the Calabasas estate his mother, Kris Jenner, bought for him last February. The couple enjoyed a whirlwind romance. Rob began dating the 28-year-old model in January 2016, and they got engaged on April 5. They announced they were expecting a baby a month later and Dream was born on November 10. The two have been living separately as Chyna moved back into her home and Rob lives in the Calabasas estate his mother, Kris Jenner, bought for him last February (pictured in May 2016)
